column1: During the year 2020, 34 airlines including the national carrier Sri Lankan Airlines operated flights to Sri Lanka (Table 17  and Table 8). The number of flights
operated by these carriers amounted to 1,247 per week. The average seats available in incoming flights per week was 142,782. Top three airlines carrying more than
200,00 tourists to Sri Lanka were Sri Lankan Airlines, Emirates and Qatar Airways.
In analyzing the arrivals by carrier, Inter regional flights have contributed to 63.3% of the arrivals while intra - regional flights and charter flights contributed to 26.2%
and 5.3% respectively (Table 7). During the year under review there were around 45 charter airlines operating to Sri Lanka.
